title: Generalizability on ACES and health for elderly

content.question: Which of the following explains why Dr. Lloyd might be unable to generalize his findings to all elderly people?

choices.label: The sample of subjects is from only one retirement community and may not be representative of all elderly people.
The surveys taken by the residents might be worded in such a way as to elicit incorrect information about ACES.
Dr. Lloyd did not use a double-blind procedure, which may have influenced the results of the survey.
Dr. Lloyd did not operationally define each of the health conditions reported by the physicians.

content.answer: The sample of subjects is from only one retirement community and may not be representative of all elderly people.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
